metadata.synopsis: One-liner plus HasMet for one of the children who has lost their ball at the back of the Lower City Park.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the child at the back of the Park in CTY_Main_A at coords: -93, 27, -28

0.speaker: Conall
0.text: I don't care what Emen said, I'm not getting the ball. And you can't make me.

1.speaker: Conall
1.text: Still not going to get Emen's ball. Bet it's real damp by now.
